ComicInfo.Summary: After Frank finally dies, Odin gives him the opportunity to become the Cosmic Ghost Rider again. Frank's decision is to go back in time and kill Thanos as a baby.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:36:00. [Issue ID 1822599]
ComicInfo.Characters: Thanos,Odin,Koldaxe the Grave,Cosmic Ghost Rider [Frank Castle]
